body_html:
@yuanbyu it's possible that swap_memory takes a tensor that we're keeping track of inside the TensorArray and moves it off the CPU to the GPU. When the TensorArray tries to access it, it's no longer there.

@davzha we'll need the complete debug log and an example code snippet to reproduce...

body:
